1: שִׁמְע֤וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Listen</n> אִיִּים֙ <sup>339 </sup> <n>O isles</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> וְהַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <sup>7181 </sup> <n>unto me and hearken</n> לְאֻמִּ֖ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>ye people</n> מֵרָח֑וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> מִבֶּ֣טֶן <sup>990 </sup> <n>me from the womb</n> קְרָאָ֔נִי <sup>7121 </sup> <n>hath called</n> מִמְּעֵ֥י <sup>4578 </sup> <n>from the bowels</n> אִמִּ֖י <sup>517 </sup> <n>of my mother</n> הִזְכִּ֥יר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>hath he made mention</n> שְׁמִֽי׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>of my name</n>
2: וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And he hath made</n> פִּי֙ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>my mouth</n> כְּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>sword</n> חַדָּ֔ה <sup>2299 </sup> <n>like a sharp</n> בְּצֵ֥ל <sup>6738 </sup> <n>in the shadow</n> יָד֖וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hand</n> הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי <sup>2244 </sup> <n>hath he hid</n> וַיְשִׂימֵ֙נִי֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>me and made</n> לְחֵ֣ץ <sup>2671 </sup> <n>shaft</n> בָּר֔וּר <sup>1305 </sup> <n>me a polished</n> בְּאַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <sup>827 </sup> <n>in his quiver</n> הִסְתִּירָֽנִי׃ <sup>5641 </sup> <n>hath he hid</n>
3: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And said</n> לִ֖י עַבְדִּי־ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>unto me Thou [art] my servant</n> אָ֑תָּה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֕ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Whom</n> בְּךָ֖ אֶתְפָּאָֽר׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>in whom I will be glorified</n>
4: וַאֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then I said</n> לְרִ֣יק <sup>7385 </sup> <n>in vain</n> יָגַ֔עְתִּי <sup>3021 </sup> <n>I have laboured</n> לְתֹ֥הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>for nought</n> וְהֶ֖בֶל <sup>1892 </sup> <n>and in vain</n> כֹּחִ֣י <sup>3581 </sup> <n>my strength</n> כִלֵּ֑יתִי <sup>3615 </sup> <n>I have spent</n> אָכֵן֙ <sup>403 </sup> <n>[yet] surely</n> מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>my judgment</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>is with</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[is] with the LORD</n> וּפְעֻלָּתִ֖י <sup>6468 </sup> <n>and my work</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>with</n> אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>with my God</n>
5: וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>and now</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And now saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> יֹצְרִ֤י <sup>3335 </sup> <n>that formed</n> מִבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <sup>990 </sup> <n>me from the womb</n> לְעֶ֣בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>[to be] his servant</n> ל֔וֹ לְשׁוֹבֵ֤ב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>again</n> יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>Jacob</n> אֵלָ֔יו <sup>413 </sup> <n>to him</n> וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>to him Though Israel</n> [לֹא כ] (לֹ֣ו <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> ק) יֵאָסֵ֑ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>be not gathered</n> וְאֶכָּבֵד֙ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>yet shall I be glorious</n> בְּעֵינֵ֣י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in the eyes</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וֵאלֹהַ֖י <sup>430 </sup> <n>and my God</n> הָיָ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> עֻזִּֽי׃ <sup>5797 </sup> <n>shall be my strength</n>
6: וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>And he said</n> נָקֵ֨ל <sup>7043 </sup> <n>It is a light thing</n> מִֽהְיוֹתְךָ֥ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>may reach</n> לִי֙ עֶ֔בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>that thou shouldest be my servant</n> לְהָקִים֙ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to raise up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שִׁבְטֵ֣י <sup>7626 </sup> <n>the tribes</n> יַעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> [וּנְצִירֵי כ] (וּנְצוּרֵ֥י <sup>5336 </sup> <n>preserved</n> ק) יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> לְהָשִׁ֑יב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and to restore</n> וּנְתַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will also give</n> לְא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>thee for a light</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>to the Gentiles</n> לִֽהְי֥וֹת <sup>1961 </sup> <n>may reach</n> יְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <sup>3444 </sup> <n>that thou mayest be my salvation</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> קְצֵ֥ה <sup>7097 </sup> <n>unto the end</n> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> ס
7: כֹּ֣ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָֽמַר־ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָה֩ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> גֹּאֵ֨ל <sup>1350 </sup> <n>the Redeemer</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> קְדוֹשׁ֗וֹ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>[and] his Holy One</n> לִבְזֹה־ <sup>960 </sup> <n>despiseth</n> נֶ֜פֶשׁ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>to him whom man</n> לִמְתָ֤עֵֽב <sup>8581 </sup> <n>abhorreth</n> גּוֹי֙ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>to him whom the nation</n> לְעֶ֣בֶד <sup>5650 </sup> <n>to a servant</n> מֹשְׁלִ֔ים <sup>4910 </sup> <n>of rulers</n> מְלָכִים֙ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>Kings</n> יִרְא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> וָקָ֔מוּ <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and arise</n> שָׂרִ֖ים <sup>8269 </sup> <n>princes</n> וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֑וּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>also shall worship</n> לְמַ֤עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>Because</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>because of the LORD</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נֶאֱמָ֔ן <sup>539 </sup> <n>that is faithful</n> קְדֹ֥שׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>[and] the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וַיִּבְחָרֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>977 </sup> <n>and he shall choose</n>
8: כֹּ֣ה ׀ <sup>3541 </sup> <n>Thus</n> אָמַ֣ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Thus saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּעֵ֤ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>time</n> רָצוֹן֙ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>In an acceptable</n> עֲנִיתִ֔יךָ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>have I heard</n> וּבְי֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>thee and in a day</n> יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <sup>3444 </sup> <n>of salvation</n> עֲזַרְתִּ֑יךָ <sup>5826 </sup> <n>have I helped</n> וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <sup>5341 </sup> <n>thee and I will preserve</n> וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֙ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>thee and give</n> לִבְרִ֣ית <sup>1285 </sup> <n>thee for a covenant</n> עָ֔ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of the people</n> לְהָקִ֣ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>to establish</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> לְהַנְחִ֖יל <sup>5157 </sup> <n>to cause to inherit</n> נְחָל֥וֹת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>heritages</n> שֹׁמֵמֽוֹת׃ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>the desolate</n>
9: לֵאמֹ֤ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>That thou mayest say</n> לַֽאֲסוּרִים֙ <sup>631 </sup> <n>to the prisoners</n> צֵ֔אוּ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Go forth</n> לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> בַּחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>to them that [are] in darkness</n> הִגָּל֑וּ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>Shew</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>Along</n> דְּרָכִ֣ים <sup>1870 </sup> <n>in the ways</n> יִרְע֔וּ <sup>7462 </sup> <n>yourselves They shall feed</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> שְׁפָיִ֖ים <sup>8205 </sup> <n>[shall be] in all high places</n> מַרְעִיתָֽם׃ <sup>4830 </sup> <n>and their pastures</n>
10: לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִרְעָ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7456 </sup> <n>They shall not hunger</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִצְמָ֔אוּ <sup>6770 </sup> <n>nor thirst</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יַכֵּ֥ם <sup>5221 </sup> <n>smite</n> שָׁרָ֖ב <sup>8273 </sup> <n>neither shall the heat</n> וָשָׁ֑מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>nor sun</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מְרַחֲמָ֣ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>them for he that hath mercy</n> יְנַהֲגֵ֔ם <sup>5090 </sup> <n>on them shall lead</n> וְעַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מַבּ֥וּעֵי <sup>4002 </sup> <n>them even by the springs</n> מַ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n> יְנַהֲלֵֽם׃ <sup>5095 </sup> <n>shall he guide</n>
11: וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>And I will make</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הָרַ֖י <sup>2022 </sup> <n>all my mountains</n> לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>a way</n> וּמְסִלֹּתַ֖י <sup>4546 </sup> <n>and my highways</n> יְרֻמֽוּן׃ <sup>7311 </sup> <n>shall be exalted</n>
12: הִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> אֵ֕לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> מֵרָח֖וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> יָבֹ֑אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>Behold these shall come</n> וְהִֽנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and lo</n> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> מִצָּפ֣וֹן <sup>6828 </sup> <n>and lo these from the north</n> וּמִיָּ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>and from the west</n> וְאֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>and these</n> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and these from the land</n> סִינִֽים׃ <sup>5515 </sup> <n>of Sinim</n>
13: רָנּ֤וּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>Sing</n> שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>O heavens</n> וְגִ֣ילִי <sup>1523 </sup> <n>and be joyful</n> אָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>O earth</n> [יִפְצְחוּ כ] (וּפִצְח֥וּ <sup>6476 </sup> <n>break forth</n> ק) הָרִ֖ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>O mountains</n> רִנָּ֑ה <sup>7440 </sup> <n>into singing</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נִחַ֤ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>hath comforted</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> עַמּ֔וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> וַעֲנִיָּ֖ו <sup>6041 </sup> <n>upon his afflicted</n> יְרַחֵֽם׃ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>and will have mercy</n> ס
14: וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>But Zion</n> עֲזָבַ֣נִי <sup>5800 </sup> <n>hath forsaken</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> וַאדֹנָ֖י <sup>136 </sup> <n>me and my Lord</n> שְׁכֵחָֽנִי׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>hath forgotten</n>
15: הֲתִשְׁכַּ֤ח <sup>7911 </sup> <n>forget</n> אִשָּׁה֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>Can a woman</n> עוּלָ֔הּ <sup>5764 </sup> <n>her sucking child</n> מֵרַחֵ֖ם <sup>7355 </sup> <n>that she should not have compassion</n> בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>on the son</n> בִּטְנָ֑הּ <sup>990 </sup> <n>belly</n> גַּם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>again</n> אֵ֣לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> תִשְׁכַּ֔חְנָה <sup>7911 </sup> <n>yet will I not forget</n> וְאָנֹכִ֖י <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> אֶשְׁכָּחֵֽךְ׃ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>forget</n>
16: הֵ֥ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כַּפַּ֖יִם <sup>3709 </sup> <n>thee upon the palms of [my] hands</n> חַקֹּתִ֑יךְ <sup>2710 </sup> <n>Behold I have graven</n> חוֹמֹתַ֥יִךְ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>thy walls</n> נֶגְדִּ֖י <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n> תָּמִֽיד׃ <sup>8548 </sup> <n>[are] continually</n>
17: מִֽהֲר֖וּ <sup>4116 </sup> <n>shall make haste</n> בָּנָ֑יִךְ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Thy children</n> מְהָֽרְסַ֥יִךְ <sup>2040 </sup> <n>thy destroyers</n> וּמַחֲרִבַ֖יִךְ <sup>2717 </sup> <n>and they that made thee waste</n> מִמֵּ֥ךְ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>shall go forth</n>
18: שְׂאִֽי־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Lift up</n> סָבִ֤יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thine eyes</n> וּרְאִ֔י <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and behold</n> כֻּלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>all these gather themselves together</n> בָֽאוּ־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>[and] come</n> לָ֑ךְ חַי־ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>to thee [As] I live</n> אָ֣נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>will surely</n> כֻלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> כָּעֲדִ֣י <sup>5716 </sup> <n>thee with them all as with an ornament</n> תִלְבָּ֔שִׁי <sup>3847 </sup> <n>thou shalt surely clothe</n> וּֽתְקַשְּׁרִ֖ים <sup>7194 </sup> <n>and bind</n> כַּכַּלָּֽה׃ <sup>3618 </sup> <n>them [on thee] as a bride</n>
19: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> חָרְבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>2723 </sup> <n>For thy waste</n> וְשֹׁ֣מְמֹתַ֔יִךְ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>and thy desolate places</n> וְאֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and the land</n> הֲרִֽסֻתֵ֑יךְ <sup>2035 </sup> <n>of thy destruction</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> תֵּצְרִ֣י <sup>3334 </sup> <n>shall even now be too narrow</n> מִיּוֹשֵׁ֔ב <sup>3427 </sup> <n>by reason of the inhabitants</n> וְרָחֲק֖וּ <sup>7368 </sup> <n>shall be far away</n> מְבַלְּעָֽיִךְ׃ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>and they that swallowed thee up</n>
20: ע֚וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>will yet</n> יֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>the other shall say</n> בְאָזְנַ֔יִךְ <sup>241 </sup> <n>again in thine ears</n> בְּנֵ֖י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The children</n> שִׁכֻּלָ֑יִךְ <sup>7923 </sup> <n>which thou shalt have after thou hast lost</n> צַר־ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>[is] too strait</n> לִ֥י הַמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>The place</n> גְּשָׁה־ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>for me give</n> לִּ֥י וְאֵשֵֽׁבָה׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to me that I may dwell</n>
21: וְאָמַ֣רְתְּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then shalt thou say</n> בִּלְבָבֵ֗ךְ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in thine heart</n> מִ֤י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יָֽלַד־ <sup>3205 </sup> <n>Who hath begotten</n> לִי֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> וַאֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> שְׁכוּלָ֖ה <sup>7921 </sup> <n>me these seeing I have lost my children</n> וְגַלְמוּדָ֑ה <sup>1565 </sup> <n>and am desolate</n> גֹּלָ֣ה ׀ <sup>1473 </sup> <n>captive</n> וְסוּרָ֗ה <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and removing to and fro</n> וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> מִ֣י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> גִדֵּ֔ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>? and who hath brought up</n> הֵ֤ן <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> נִשְׁאַ֣רְתִּי <sup>7604 </sup> <n>these?
